member.name: M:Milvonion.Application.Utils.Extensions.MilvonionExtensions.DataUriRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^data:(?<mediatype>[\\w/+.-]+);base64,(?<data>[a-zA-Z0-9+/]+={0,2})$
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Match the string "data:".
"mediatype" capture group.
Match a character in the set [+--/\w] atomically at least once.
Match the string ";base64,".
"data" capture group.
Match a character in the set [+/-9A-Za-z] atomically at least once.
Match '=' atomically at most 2 times.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Milvonion.Application.Utils.Extensions.MilvonionExtensions.ReplaceAndToLowerRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\s+
Explanation:
Match a whitespace character atomically at least once.

member.name: M:Milvonion.Application.Utils.Extensions.MilvonionExtensions.UrlRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^(ht|f)tp(s?)\\:\\/\\/[0-9a-zA-Z]([-.\\w]*[0-9a-zA-Z])*(:(0-9)*)*(\\/?)([a-zA-Z0-9\\-\\.\\?\\,\\'\\/\\\\\\+&%\\$#_]*)?$
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
1st capture group.
Match with 2 alternative expressions.
Match the string "ht".
Match 'f'.
Match the string "tp".
2nd capture group.
Match 's' atomically, optionally.
Match the string "://".
Match a character in the set [0-9A-Za-z].
Loop greedily any number of times.
3rd capture group.
Match a character in the set [-.\w] greedily any number of times.
Match a character in the set [0-9A-Za-z].
Loop greedily any number of times.
4th capture group.
Match ':'.
Loop greedily any number of times.
5th capture group.
Match the string "0-9".
6th capture group.
Match '/' greedily, optionally.
Optional (greedy).
7th capture group.
Match a character in the set [#-'+-9?A-Z\\_a-z] greedily any number of times.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
